summary: This document is an email chain regarding scheduling a meeting concerning Mark Epstein. The emails show confusion and rescheduling of a meeting from October 28, 2019, to October 31, 2019, at 3:00 p.m. The participants include an Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York and another individual.

persons.name: Mark Epstein
persons.context: The email chain is about scheduling a meeting concerning Mark Epstein. He is the brother of Jeffrey Epstein and a known figure in the case.

events.title: Scheduled meeting about Mark Epstein
events.description: A meeting was scheduled for 3:00 p.m. on October 28, 2019, concerning Mark Epstein, but was missed due to a scheduling conflict.

events.title: Rescheduled meeting about Mark Epstein
events.description: The meeting concerning Mark Epstein was rescheduled to October 31, 2019, at 3:00 p.m.

keyFacts: The email chain shows scheduling confusion for a meeting about Mark Epstein in October 2019.
An Assistant United States Attorney from the Southern District of New York was involved in scheduling the meeting.
The meeting was initially set for October 28, 2019, but was rescheduled to October 31, 2019, due to a conflict.
